abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the State and
            Provincial Roads Project are to:  (i) keep transport costs
            low in Turkey by ensuring adequate renewal and maintenance
            of the road network; (ii) reduce the backlog of road
            strengthening; (iii) continue the downsizing, modernization
            and improvement of the management of the General Directorate
            of Highways (KGM's) equipment fleet; (iv) strengthen
            and modernize the planning and design capabilities of KGM;
            and (v) improve the management and safety of the road system
            through reforms, modernization and training.  The project
            includes:  (a) strengthening of high priority sections of
            existing state roads; (b) improvement of selected provincial
            roads; (c) procurement of equipment and materials for road
            maintenance, research, planning, survey and design,
            reorganization, computerization and training; (d)
            improvement of road safety; (e) training for KGM's
            staff; and (f) consulting services.
